about_the_game:
Buy the EA SPORTS™ WRC 24 Season Expansion Bundle to get:
  • Locations & Cars Content Pack
  • Le Maestros Content Pack
  • Hard Chargers Content Pack
Elevate your rally experience with the WRC 2024 Season Expansion Bundle. Discover thrilling new locations, Tet Rally Latvia and the Orlen 80th Rally Poland. Drive the latest high-performance vehicles including the Ford Fiesta Rally3 Evo and Toyota GR Yaris Rally1 HYBRID '24. Customize your rally cars with more than 50 new liveries and compete against 52 official crews. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey.

2 new locations:
  • Tet Rally Latvia — embark on a thrilling new adventure with the Tet Rally Latvia, a brand-new destination in the 2024 WRC calendar
  • Orlen 80th Rally Poland — after a five-year hiatus, the iconic Orlen 80th Rally Poland makes a triumphant return
5 new vehicles:
  • Ford Fiesta Rally3 Evo
  • Ford Puma Rally1 HYBRID '24
  • Hyundai i20 N Rally1 HYBRID '24
  • Toyota GR Yaris Rally1 HYBRID '24
  • Toyota GR Yaris Rally2

New customization options:
  • 52 New liveries
  • 104 new drivers and co-drivers
2 new content packs:
  • Le Maestros
  • Hard Chargers

legal_notice: Requires EA SPORTS WRC (sold separately) and all game updates.  Le Maestros content pack available in winter 2024.  Hard Chargers content pack available in spring 2025. Limited Spanish language support.
name: EA SPORTS™ WRC 24 Season Expansion Bundle

short_description: Experience the thrill of the 2024 rally season with new locations, moments, stages, high-performance vehicles, new liveries, and licensed crews. Brace yourself to embark on your continued rally journey.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
